typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string,
		CreatedOn as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		UpdatedOn as timestamp,
		UpdatedBy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceEcommerceADF
source1 derive(CreatedOn = currentTimestamp(),
		UpdatedOn = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, sourceEcommerceADF lookup(source1@BrowserID == sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID),
	!isNull(sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID)||source1@ReferrerDomain!=sourceEcommerceADF@ReferrerDomain||source1@UTMSource!=sourceEcommerceADF@UTMSource||source1@UTMMedium!=sourceEcommerceADF@UTMMedium||source1@UTMCampaign!=sourceEcommerceADF@UTMCampaign||source1@UTMContent!=sourceEcommerceADF@UTMCampaign,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecords, DeleteRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string,
		CreatedOn as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		UpdatedOn as timestamp,
		UpdatedBy as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'dd-MM-yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	booleanFormat: ['true', 'false'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		BrowserID = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@BrowserID,
		ReferrerDomain = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@ReferrerDomain,
		UTMSource = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@UTMSource,
		UTMMedium = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@UTMMedium,
		UTMCampaign = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@UTMCampaign,
		UTMContent = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@UTMContent,
		CreatedOn = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@CreatedOn,
		UpdatedOn = ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord@UpdatedOn
	)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string,
		CreatedOn as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		UpdatedOn as timestamp,
		UpdatedBy as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		BrowserID = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@BrowserID,
		ReferrerDomain = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@ReferrerDomain,
		UTMSource = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@UTMSource,
		UTMMedium = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@UTMMedium,
		UTMCampaign = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@UTMCampaign,
		UTMContent = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@UTMContent,
		UpdatedOn = ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecords@UpdatedOn
	)) ~> sink2
